blogPost.excerpt: Trexy allows you to track your own expenses. You can also track lending and borrowing records between your family and friends. Multi-currency comes in handy regardless of which currency you spend on. Expenses are grouped by category in monthly pie-chart.
blogPost.body: Trexy allows you to track your own expenses. You can also track lending and borrowing records between your family and friends. Multi-currency comes in handy regardless of which currency you spend on. Expenses are grouped by category in monthly pie-chart.
blogPost.title: Trexy - Track expenses and debts easily with multi-currency support.
blogPost.author: Meng Taing

localize.description: Trexy允许你跟踪自己的支出。您还可以追踪家人和朋友之间的借贷记录。无论你用哪种货币消费，多币种都很方便。在每月的饼状图中，支出按类别进行分组。
localize.tagline: 支持多种货币，轻松追踪费用和债务。

localize.description: Trexy允許你跟蹤自己的支出。您還可以追蹤家人和朋友之間的借貸記錄。無論你用哪種貨幣消費，多幣種都很方便。在每月的餅狀圖中，支出按類別進行分組。
localize.tagline: 支持多種貨幣，輕鬆追蹤費用和債務。

next.excerpt: data analytics company for the music industry and enables users to analyze the acquired data and use them as required. PlayTreks data analytics services can assist in product development, identifying potential market gaps, improve efficiency, extend reach.
next.title: PlayTreks - Music distribution and cross channel data dashboard

localize.description: 音乐行业的数据分析公司，并使用户能够分析获得的数据，并根据需要使用这些数据。PlayTreks的数据分析服务可以协助产品开发，发现潜在的市场空白，提高效率，扩大影响力。
localize.tagline: 音乐发行和跨渠道数据仪表板

localize.description: 音樂行業的數據分析公司，並使用戶能夠分析獲得的數據，並根據需要使用這些數據。PlayTreks的數據分析服務可以協助產品開發，發現潛在的市場空白，提高效率，擴大影響力。
localize.tagline: 音樂發行和跨渠道數據儀表板
